sentences.english: Striking beating patterns in magnetoresistance vs magnetic field are observed in the vicinity of a specific temperature.
sentences.chinese: 在一定溫度範圍內觀察到磁阻拍頻現象。

sentences.english: One new microcomputer control technique used on switched reluctance motor driving system is put forward.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種磁力線開關型混合勵磁磁阻電機方案。

sentences.english: Over the past 30 years several new forms of magnetoresistance have been found.
sentences.chinese: 30年中已經由好幾種磁阻的新形態被人們發現。

sentences.english: Moreover, these magnetoresistance data can be fitted well with the theories of quantum interference effects.
sentences.chinese: 而且磁阻數據可由量子干涉理論擬合的很好。

sentences.english: Magnetic suspension switched reluctance motor has combined characteristics of synchronous motor and magnetic bearing.
sentences.chinese: 磁懸浮開關磁阻電機結合了同步電機和磁軸承的優點。

sentences.english: The advantages of the switched reluctance variable speed machine is given.
sentences.chinese: 給出開關磁阻調速電機的優點。

sentences.english: Considerable vibration and acoustic noise limit the application of Switched Reluctance Motors (SRMs).
sentences.chinese: 相當大的振動和噪聲阻礙了開關磁阻電機的推廣應用。

sentences.english: Vernier-type reluctance motors are widely used in industrial automation.
sentences.chinese: 遊標式磁阻電動機廣泛應用於工業自動化領域。

sentences.english: This peper presents a method of controlling a variable reluctance motor using a microcomputer.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出並實現了一種變磁阻電機的計算機控制方案。

sentences.english: It defines the voltage vector for Switched Reluctance Motor.
sentences.chinese: 定義了開關磁阻電機的電壓矢量。

sentences.english: A new approach for controlling a switched- reluctance generator (SRG) was presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種針對開關磁阻發電機的新控制策略。

sentences.english: The closed loop control of the motor position and velocity are realized using the microcomputer.
sentences.chinese: 採用計算機實現了變磁阻電機的位置和速度閉環控制。

sentences.english: Principle of GMR sensor and its output characteristics are presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了巨磁阻傳感器的工作原理和輸出特性。

sentences.english: The flexion angles of lingers are indirectly measured by the non-contact magnetoresistance sensors.
sentences.chinese: 採用非接觸式磁阻傳感器，間接測量手指的彎曲角度。

sentences.english: It is interesting that the electric current can also change the magnetoresistance of the films.
sentences.chinese: 同時，我們還觀察到電流對磁阻的影響。
